theFactory:ChargeChargeCharge.NAME: Charge-Up Core
theFactory:ChargeChargeCharge.FLAVOR: The mechanical monsters are enraged by your boisterous actions.

theFactory:Remembrance.NAME: Remembrance
theFactory:Remembrance.FLAVOR: The Merchant has met their end many times to Spire denizens and irate shoppers alike. Fortunately, anything is possible with enough Gold.
